Posts.Content: What kind of withdrawal side effects did you experience?  I ended treatment with Femara in June, and I am experiencing severe joint pains.  I had the typical pains while on the drug, but my joint pain has gotten worse. I welcome your thoughts.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Does anyone have joint pains post chemo and radiation therapy?  I was diagnosed in 2006.  I just completed hormone therapy with Fermara this past June.  Joints have been killing me over the last 4 weeks. Is anyone taking anything that helps other than pain killers.
Posts.Title: Joint Pain/breast Cancer Survivors

Posts.Content: Malignant breast tumors are NOT painful. The radiologist can tell from the ultrasound and mammogram if these lumps are suspicious.  If you want 110% peace of mind have the doctor send you for an MRI of your breast.  It is a simple screening, and it will see anything the size of a pin head. Push the doctor, he will send you for the MRI b/c of the breast pain.  Your medical insurance has to cover it.
Posts.Title: Please Help!!!

Posts.Content: On Jun 27, 2012 2:04 AM SMSGNJ wrote: I am 7 months post breast cancer radiation.  Stage 1, lumpectomy, no chemo and now on Arimidex.  i have noticed over the last few months a tenderness in my ribs on the side where I had radiation.  I have read that this could be a side effect of radiation by my Rad Onc says no.  Anybody experience this?  Many thanks! I had radiation for my breast cancer in 2007.  My ribs are still tender to the touch.  It is a side effect that can stay with you for life.
Posts.Title: Tender ribs after breast cancer radiation

Posts.Content: I have been on Femara since 2007. I took tamoxifin for one year in 2006, then I was put on Femara.  the aches and pains were terrrible. I had my annual check up with my onc, on 6/18 and I was finally taken off Femara.  My joints in my hands elbows, feet and my legs and arms ache more now then when i was on the Femara.  I always had body aches but I don't see improvement and they seem to have gotten worse.  How long after going off the Femara before you see improvement?  Is there a chance that these side effects are long lasting. I am praying for some relief!  Does anyone have any suggestions?
Posts.Title: After Femara side effects
